title: Medina: El estafador de famosos
overview: "Medina" is a mysterious character who has spent the last 20 years scamming dozens of TV personalities by pretending to be a former colleague with a personal drama. No one has managed to find him yet, but Jorge Ponce sets out to try with this documentary. Is a comedian the right person to hunt down Spain's biggest celebrity swindler, or is there more than one imposter in this series?
